Name: Locanda
Review Text: Very tasty italian cuisine. Best pizza I've ever had. Everyo made from scratch and nice wines. Cozy place and nice staff. Good pricing, me and my friends are students but could still afford a nice dinner.

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Tiny little Italian gem of a little restaurant with a modern but cozy atmosphere, and incredibly affordable pricing.  Feels like a "neighborhood" place, but with such creativity, quality, and precise execution, it's worth making your way …

Name: Locanda
Review Text: I am Italian and I can say the pizza here is really worth it! The ingredients are all Italian and they are all fresh and delicious. Pizza was as crunchy as the Italian one and the ham on it comes from a little place in Italy, so it’s not usual also to find that ham in my country. Tourists and locals should try!

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Wonderful food and service for a reasonable price. Each dish we got was €14-€16. They served complimentary bread with lemon butter that was made in house. The food did not take long to make and was clearly fresh. Free WiFi, clean bathroom for customers. I would 100% recommend this place!

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Small Italian place with dedicated staff. Dishes are tasteful and prepared in the basement kitchen. …

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Took a while for the food to arrive. Tables were very close one to another. Lasagna is apparently the popular dish but there is no tomato sauce and I was still hungry after eating it.

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Had a great meal here on Tuesday. The starter with the cured pork and fried bread was incredible. Not sure what made the mozzarella so creamy but it all great. …

Name: Locanda
Review Text: The place has potential, if they get more experienced staff (kitchen + waiters) or train current one. Despite making a reservation, our table was not ready. They sent us to a different, smaller table for the first 10 min, but that one was …

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Really nice and friendly service. The food was good, but not more than normal and i was soo disapointed because the price was way to high for everage food. The pictures where from the last year (i was also there). As Dessert we got a …

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Absolutely great Italian food. Good wine selection, very friendly staff and a dessert that was to die for. Had an great time there and would definitely recommend a visit if you like fine Italian cuisine. (don't expect a casual pizzeria)

Name: Locanda
Review Text:
It was a nice evening, the staff is very friendly and the food was good....

BUT it was definitely not the price worth. Last year I was in the same …

Name: Locanda
Review Text: The best restaurant we visited while on our holiday in Amsterdam! Lovely staff with great service and the food is fantastic! I can highly recommend the lasagne and the tiramasu is a knockout! Prices are also very reasonable given the location, next time we're in the city it'll be our first port of call!

Name: Locanda
Review Text:
Best Lassagna and (Not) Tiramisu I have ever eaten. Its a really nice place where u can have a peaceful dinner. Lovely waiter.
Only thing they could improve is the menu, really limited, delicious though.

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Recommended by our hotel concierge and we are glad we took her advice! Great food, very warm and friendly atmosphere, casual environment, and excellent service. Specials and wine pairing advised by the waiter was delicious. Definitely recommend the tiramisu!

Name: Locanda
Review Text: We had a lovely meal on our last night in Amsterdam at this charming restaurant in the Jardaan. Started with the vitello tonnato - best I've ever had including a couple sad experiences in Italy. Lasagnetta a delicious take on traditional …

Name: Locanda
Review Text: A cozy great little place for an amazing italian dinner. We were all impressed with the food and the welcoming atmosphere. I would definitely go here again!

Name: Locanda
Review Text: We found this by chance, walking around the Jordaan, and count ourselves very lucky. Slightly utilitarian atmosphere, but the food is brilliant! And the wine list is good value for money

Name: Locanda
Review Text: What a great find in the Jordaan. Super cute Italian restaurant with a great menu. Delicious food, good wine and very reasonable prices. I had the tortelli and it was great, and the starters were top too. I’ll be back!

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Had an awesome and cosy experience with very very tasty food. The host/server was very friendly and knowledgeable. …

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Unbelievably good italian. Especially the pizza. Go early, as menu items disappear throughout the night. family friendly and super helpful wait staff. A real gem.

Name: Locanda
Review Text: great place, the idea to propose italian delicacies as tapas, gives you the chance  to taste more dishes between a very good selection of italian excellences. warm place and very kind staff. recomended.

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Fantastic restaurant in a great area. The food is amazing and the staff make you feel so welcome. Would definitely recommend eating here if visiting Amsterdam.

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Had a lovely, quiet dinner there on a Wednesday evening. Warm atmosphere and friendly stuff. Great pasta and wines!

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Excellent dishes! Great service! A must of Italian Cuisine in Amsterdam! The ragu con lasagnetta is from "another planet".

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Great food: we tried lasagna (so simple, so good), another pasta and a pizza. Everything was excellent!

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Great food, immaculate and warm service in a cosy and welcoming restaurant.  We were superbly looked after on a busy Friday evening. Thoroughly recommended!

Name: Locanda
Review Text: I had a great time here with my friends. Wonderful food, I recommend their risotto. Really nice staff.

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Lasagna 2.0. - the dish was unimaginably good. Nice staff, great atmosphere. Will for sure be coming back to this one!

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Food and drinks were alright, nothing spectacular but fine. The problem was waiting 2 hours for our food and the service in general. It felt amateur. Overall a very poor experience.

Name: Locanda
Review Text: I was here twice following some tips of a friend living in Amsterdam. They just opened but they know how to make it. Nice Italian food and cool space.

Name: Locanda
Review Text: very nice atmosphere in the heart of Jordaan. salumi and cheese directly from local areas in Italy. it will become a MUST GO in Amsterdam

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Nice restaurant, friendly waiters and tasty food. Unfortunately the portion sizes are way too small.

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Lovely and cosy ambience, sirloin steak was just incredible with beautiful pairing of Italian red wine!

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Amazing; food, wine and staff. Definitely something I would recommend! p.s. order the tiramisu :-)

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Great Service and absolutely outstanding food. The deconstructed Tiramisu is to die for!

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Amazing lasagna and risotto, good wine, and relaxing atmosphere!

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Very good dishes and wine for a reasonable price

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Best wine , nice pasta . Love the place .

Name: Locanda
Review Text: Great food for fair prices. Will come again!
